definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: III. [[כמר]] (√ of foll.; cf. As. kamâru, overthrow, lay prostrate, whence n. kamâru, net, snare Dl:HWB 336 and [[כּׂמֶר]] priest acc. to Dl:HA 42, i.e. one who prostrates himself; also Mand. [[כמר]] turn round, bring back Nö:M 443 f. and N. Syr. kmr pursue Nö:ib PS:1759).
